price: 他们将说：“不然！你们才是不受欢迎的，你们曾把我们诱惑到这种境地，这归宿真恶劣！”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum antum qaddamtumūhu lanā fabi'sa al-qarāru
